</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 34 

**Fort** +22 

**Ref** +26 (+28 to [Grab an Edge](/Actions.aspx?ID=95))

**Will** +20 

</row>

**HP** 230

**Agile Faller** Akila takes half damage from falls.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_katar_ +24 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [deadly 1d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d4+10 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_composite longbow_ +28 ([deadly 2d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 3d8+10 piercing

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) Akila's mask melds into her face and she takes on the form of a leopard, or she returns to her halfling form. As a leopard, the only Strikes she can make are a jaws Strike (which deals 3d6+10 piercing damage plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)) and an [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170) claws Strike (which deals 3d4+10 slashing damage).

**Pounce** <actions string="Single Action" />  Akila Strides, then Strikes. If she was [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) at the start of this action, she remains hidden until after the Strike.

**Powerful Leap** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Akila [Leaps](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) either up to 50 feet horizontally and 10 feet vertically or up to 25 feet vertically and up to 10 feet horizontally. She can make a Strike at any point during the Leap. If she hits, she deals an extra 8 bludgeoning damage from the impact.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   Akila deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) targets.

</column>
